raw_body: MANEL – PERERA (nee CALDERA),​ Past Teacher of Ananda College,​ daughter of Leelananda Caldera and Evelyn,​ cherished wife of Sisira Perera,​ loving mother of Rev. Sapugaskande Ratanasara Thero and Hasini,​ mother-in-law of Thamara,​ sister of Nelum Senadira and grandmother of Vidumini,​ Uthpala,​ Sewmini and Induwara,​ peacefully passed away on 26th September. In accordance with her wishes,​ funeral was held on 27th September. The family is grateful to the dedicated Doctors and staff of Sri Jayawardanapura Hospital for their support and compassionate care.061456
